title: Data Science Practical Competency Enhancement: Online Cross-Cultural Field Learning: Action Research-Based Elementary

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can identify and explain at least three intercultural communication strategies in online environments.
Learners can plan and implement online field research using action research methodologies.
Learners can analyze data collected through virtual field visits and develop one intercultural education scenario.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
